    • getBrowser

      public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getBrowser()
      Given that there is no test data file, read the target browser value from pom configuration (overridable from jenkins), if "Default" it fails because it will not be able to read the "Target Browser" cell value from the configured test data file.
      Returns:
      a singleton browser instance

    • getBrowser

      public static org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver getBrowser​(java.lang.String browserName)
      Create and/or return an instance of the target browser (maintains a single instance per browser type) and checks for cross-compatibility between the selected browser and operating system

      This method will be removed soon. Use getBrowser(BrowserType) instead.

      Parameters:
      browserName - the name of the browser that you want to run, currently supports 'MozillaFirefox', 'MicrosoftInternetExplorer', 'GoogleChrome', and 'MicrosoftEdge'
      Returns:
      a singleton browser instance
